= Introduction =

PyroScope is a collection of tools for the BitTorrent protocol and especially the rTorrent client. It offers the following components:
 * CommandLineTools for automation of common tasks, like metafile creation, and [RtControlExamples filtering and mass-changing your loaded torrents]
 * patches to [RtorrentExtended improve your rTorrent experience], like new commands and canvas coloring
 * rTorrent extensions like a QueueManager and statistics (_work in progress_)
 * a modern and versatile rTorrent web interface (currently on hold)

See the ScreenShotGallery if you want to get a first impression without [QuickStartGuide installing the software].

http://i.imgur.com/UALM1.png

To get started right away, see the QuickStartGuide. It's also very easy to WriteYourOwnScripts to automate anything that the standard commands can't do. To get in contact and share your experiences with other users of PyroScope, join the [http://groups.google.com/group/pyroscope-users pyroscope-users] mailing list or the inofficial <a href="irc://irc.freenode.net/rtorrent">`#rtorrent`</a> channel on `irc.freenode.net`.

= Project Status =
PyroScope is implemented in [http://www.python.org/ Python] using the [http://pylonshq.com/ Pylons] web framework. The main build tool is [http://www.blueskyonmars.com/projects/paver/ Paver], which is based on `setuptools`.
